Question.Subject: How much do you think I would get for some Xbox 360 stuff on eBay?
Question.Content:
How much do you think I would get on eBay for these... (all good as new)
- Xbox 360 60gb Console (with all cables etc.) - Black Wireless Controller - Wireless Network Adapter - 9 games (COD 4, COD 5, COD 6, Left 4 Dead, Far Cry Predator Instincts, FIFA 10, Ashes Cricket 2009, 007 Quantum of Solace and Tom Clancys Rainbow Six Vegas)
Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: You can check the completed listings for similiar items sold for the last 15 days by going to Advanced search > Enter your keyword ie Xbox 360 60gb console > Tick the completed listings box > search, this will give you a good indication of what price this has sold for. Repeat search for all your items. I sold Tom Clancys rainbox 6 the end of last year (it was a PS3 game though), it sold for $15.50 AU - High sell rate ranging in price from $10 to $25 at the time. You can get lucky.

Answer.Content:
that would roughly fetch 400-450. (AUS) if they are ~3months and un-opened.
(also i dont know if youre interested but im currently selling my drumkit, dont know if you'd be interested but im hunting down a 360 at current..)
Answer.Reference: months if not years of eBay research. and also recent pondering of Xbox 360 Prices :)

Answer.Content: You can check the completed listings for similiar items sold for the last 15 days by going to Advanced search > Enter your keyword ie Xbox 360 60gb console > Tick the completed listings box > search, this will give you a good indication of what price this has sold for. Repeat search for all your items. I sold Tom Clancys rainbox 6 the end of last year (it was a PS3 game though), it sold for $15.50 AU - High sell rate ranging in price from $10 to $25 at the time. You can get lucky.
